name: Estive
description:
AI_and_Games Gamejam 2022 submission 

Theme : Isolation

Try to gather your sheep before the wolf pack start to attack. Isolated sheep are a easy prey for them !

[<][^][>] Arrow keys or (o) R stick to move

[Z]  or (A) to run

[R] or (Restart) to restart

[SPACE] or (X) to woof and move the sheep

The sheep are afraid of your bark , they will gather a little bit if you stay near them, but if you're away for too long they will start to random walk or seek grass.

Wolves only attack sheeps who are isolated  from the flock, so if you see a lonely sheep try to push it in a group.

Good hunt !! :)

https://clockworkraven.itch.io/raven-fantasy-pixel-art-tileset-green-forest

(my use of the tileset doesn't do credit to its original quality )

The AI is based on basic Reynolds steering behaviors
